title: Clubs Outage?
body: I haven't seen anything about this, but I still can't see my club in client. It seems like Riot has been quiet awhile, but the post about it isn't stickied anymore... What's the status on that? Anyone else still having trouble?

replies.body: I've had this issue for awhile too, from the number of posts I assume they're aware of the number of people with this problem.
Aight. I just hadn't seen an update in a long time.

We resolved the clubs issue for most players, so we're handling to residual issues in [support tickets](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I'd recommend submitting one with your club name and tag included so we can assist you with this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Ok thanks! I submitted one earlier and they told me to wait for fixes. Didn't want to bother them again unless I needed to. Thanks so much for getting back to me!
